Add as friend Send Msg Mesa Fresh Mexican Grill RJones December 11, 2007 5.0 5.0 star rating 0 0 0 0 Votes Tasty Mexican Food
Made-to-order fresh fast food–similar to a Rubio’s or Baja Fresh. This would be my favorite among the three. The guacamole is excellent, although served in tiny portions. A few of the items are a bit basic/bland, I highly recommend choosing something with lots of toppings. The salsa is great, the beans are great, the guacamole is great. Order a steak quesadilla and you’ll get a tortilla with cheese and steak strips. It’s good, but not great. Order the nachos and you’ll have a scrumptious party on a tray, sized big enough for two or more. Link To Review
